content: "Create a dynamic, digital art illustration of a lightning bolt fighting a wave of water. The lightning bolt should be depicted with bold, jagged lines and a vibrant, electric blue color, while the wave should be depicted with smooth, fluid lines and a deep, oceanic blue color. The two should be locked in a fierce battle, with sparks and energy flying as they clash. Use a highly detailed, realistic style and a vibrant color palette to bring the scene to life."
